title: style crab cakes with quick chilli jam
description: Crab cakes are quick to put together and make great party food or starters, plus this chilli jam will keep for a couple of weeks in the fridge.
ingredients: 2-3 long red chillies, seeds removed, finely chopped
15g/½oz chunk fresh root ginger, finely chopped
200g/7oz raw peeled king prawns (or other peeled raw prawns)
1 tbsp cornflour, plus 1 tbsp extra for dusting
lime wedges and fresh coriander, to serve
